title: Pixel 3a rooting issue, stuck on "boot loader is unlocked"
content:
Hello everyone, I really hope you can help me with this problem.
I was trying to root the pixel 3a for mobile app penetration testing purposes. I followed the guide on how to root the device using Magisk, everything looked fine but after reboot the phone is stuck on "The boot loader is unlocked and software.." and f I move forward the phone freezes on G loading screen. Looks like I cannot do anything.
I am not able to use fastboot commands because it says "waiting for any device".
Is there a way to restore the phone?
Thank you very much
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
